title: New romance
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Personality development

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Gender identity - Social aspects
description: Finely drawn study of the social aspects of heterosexual and homosexual relationships and asks whether people have a right to think, feel and act differently. Excellent use of locational interviews, cartoons and meaningful dialogue and opens up a subject that is often misunderstood.
